title.rendered: CDSL supports Smile on Wheels Project

content.rendered:
CDSL partners to expand healthcare access in remote areas

CDSL is teaming up with Smile Foundation for quality healthcare services in two unique and challenging locations: Jaisalmer, Rajasthan and Leh-Ladakh. Through this Smile on Wheels project, this collaboration aims to bring primary medical care to these remote regions, ensuring that underserved communities receive the healthcare they need, right at their doorstep.

CDSL supports Smile on Wheels Project

 CDSL is providing valuable support to the Smile on Wheels project in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. Thanks to this collaboration, approximately 4,638 beneficiaries have been positively impacted to date.

Central Depository Services Limited (CDSL) was established in 1999 with a clear mission: to offer convenient, dependable, and secure depository services. Over the past two decades, CDSL has stayed true to this goal, introducing various innovations such as dematerialization of diverse asset classes and e-services. All of these efforts have been geared towards providing affordable solutions in pursuit of their core objective.
